column4: I am trying to create a new user account remotely. Can someone help me with the syntax?
I'm using ssh
dc do to .wine
go to^
/home/user/.wine
does anyone know the command to create a new user account through terminal?
thanks variant
i have no clue about anything in wine, please elaborate
you are trying to run a program with wine?
i ran the programs setup.exe in wine, it installed successfully.  i have no clue how to start it though

to learn a little more about wine and find your installed programs start by going to its root directory. It's in your home folder but it's hidden. Open a terminal and type cd .wine   you can look around with ls and traverse to find the application. You can also unhide the holders graphically and look around
dc if you go to your home folder, press Ctrl+H to unhide
look around in .wine
got it thanks a lot!
dc np
now wine opens but then immediately shuts down
dc what are you trying to open?
itunes
hmm.. never used itunes with wine so I cannot help you there. I manage my ipod with other tools
i dont even own an ipod, i want to be able to access the shared music from across campus
I think the forums have a lot of topics related to wine+itunes. You can most likely find the answer there. I've never used iTunes on wine.
